description.value:
Potion, Rare
As you imbibe this potion, you remember a time of mercy, atonement, and forgiveness—the specific memories depend on the philter’s creator. You are immune to being frightened for 1 hour and have advantage on Wisdom ability checks during that time.
The effects of this philter cancel the effects of a @UUID[Compendium.koboldpressogl-bf.koboldpressitems.Item.KPphilterofright]{philter of righteous anger}.
